original_text: Peninnah was not kind to Hannah and she made Hannah very upset. She did this because the Lord had not let Hannah give birth to any children.
korean_text: 여호와께서 그에게 임신하지 못하게 하시므로 그의 적수인 브닌나가 그를 심히 격분하게 하여 괴롭게 하더라

sentences.original_text: Peninnah was not kind to Hannah
and she made Hannah very upset
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그녀는 한나를 매우 화나게 했다

sentences.original_text: because the Lord had not let Hannah
